cause.description:
I hate when i hear Paris Hilton's name on the news, I believe they should just keep her in there with all the other jail people and let her get molested or something, because i really don't care what happens to her.
1. Paris is a human
2. Let her rot in jail
3. cover something else on the news..like guttenberg...lol
cause.mission: keep her in jail for the rest of her life, without media coverage.
cause.name: Keep Paris Hilton in jail forever, without media coverage!
